channel.title: [Suggestion] Unstoppable Force (Prince Unstoppable buff)
channel.description:
Im sick of prince getting eliminated Night 1 or Night 2.
Prince needs a buff to Unstoppable.
**Unstoppable Force** (Replaces current Unstoppable passive)
**Immune to death at night once**, also **immune to occupation and target changing**, **people who tries to occupy the prince will think they succeed**. the Prince **will appear as Support/Social to the Seeker and the Duchess (Only Support)**
Explanation: Prince is without a doubt the most powerful class in Blue Dragon and probably the most powerful in the game. But whats the point on having the Prince in the game if he always dies too soon or gets investigated by evil factions Night 1?
With this, prince will have more time to get information and probably a physician/knight guarding him.
Thats all. hope you like my idea :D

item.title: [Suggestion] Unstoppable Force (Prince Unstoppable buff)
item.dc:creator: TinyDeer
item.description:
I disagree that the Prince needs extra protection. It’s why the Knight, Physician, etc. are in the game - they should be guarding the Prince if there’s any indication of who it is. As for n1/2, evils just get lucky by killing Prince. It sucks for BD but it adds variety. If Prince dies early, advantage Evil. If Prince survives to late game, advantage BD. We shouldn’t force the Prince’s security via self-protection. There are plenty of other BD roles to work with despite Prince being the strongest, and the Prince’s mortality means that we have to adapt to the situation at hand. Being death immune once is a humongous buff since those other roles can still defend him before and after that extra life.
